comment: по клику на обломки поста сборщика податей

languages.text: Пост сборщика податей разгромлен с особым наслаждением — и не узнать, сделали это повстанцы или солдаты.
The tithe collector's post has been trashed with particular malicious delight, and there is no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.
languages.original_text: Пост сборщика податей разгромлен с особым наслаждением — и не узнать, сделали это повстанцы или солдаты.

traits.locale_text: The tithe collector's post has been trashed with special glee and gusto, and there's no telling whether the rebels or the soldiers did it.
The tithe collector's post has been trashed with special glee and gusto, and there's no telling whether the rebels or the soldiers did it.
The tithe collector's post has been trashed with especially malicious delight, and there's no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.
The tithe collector's post has been trashed with especially malicious delight, and there's no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.
The tithe collector's post has been trashed with particular malicious delight, and there is no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.
The tithe collector's post has been trashed with particular malicious delight, and there is no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.

languages.text: Der Posten des Zehnteintreibers wurde mit böswilliger Freude verwüstet, und es lässt sich nicht sagen, ob es die Rebellen oder die Soldaten waren.
languages.original_text: The tithe collector's post has been trashed with particular malicious delight, and there is no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.

traits.locale_text: Der Posten des Zehnteintreibers wurde mit böswilliger Freude verwüstet, und es lässt sich nicht sagen, ob es die Rebellen oder die Soldaten waren.

languages.text: Le poste du percepteur de la dîme a été saccagé avec un plaisir particulièrement malveillant, sans que l'on sache si c'est là l'œuvre de rebelles ou de soldats.
languages.original_text: The tithe collector's post has been trashed with particular malicious delight, and there is no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.

traits.locale_text: Le poste du percepteur de la dîme a été saccagé avec un plaisir particulièrement malveillant, sans que l'on sache si c'est là l'œuvre de rebelles ou de soldats.

languages.text: 一群满怀恶意的人特地摧毁了征税员的哨所。不知道是叛军干的，还是士兵干的。
languages.original_text: The tithe collector's post has been trashed with particular malicious delight, and there is no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.

traits.locale_text: 征税员的哨所被恶意摧毁，不知道是叛军干的，还是士兵干的。

languages.text: 徴税官のポストが、悪質にも嬉々としてゴミ箱に捨てられている。犯人が反逆者なのか兵士なのかは分からない。
languages.original_text: The tithe collector's post has been trashed with particular malicious delight, and there is no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.

traits.locale_text: 徴税官のポストが、悪質にも嬉々としてゴミ箱に捨てられている。犯人が反逆者なのか兵士なのかは分からない。

languages.text: El puesto del recaudador de diezmos ha sido destrozado con especial malicia, y no se sabe si han sido los rebeldes o los soldados quienes lo han hecho.
languages.original_text: The tithe collector's post has been trashed with particular malicious delight, and there is no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.

traits.locale_text: El puesto del recaudador de diezmos ha sido destrozado con especial malicia, y no se sabe si han sido los rebeldes o los soldados quienes lo han hecho.

languages.text: Birisi, aşar tahsildarının ofisini büyük ve şeytani bir zevkle tahrip etmiş. Yapanın isyancılar mı yoksa askerler mi olduğunu kestirmek imkânsız.
languages.original_text: The tithe collector's post has been trashed with particular malicious delight, and there is no telling whether it was the rebels or the soldiers who did it.

traits.locale_text: Birisi, tahsildarın ofisini gözünü bile kırpmadan altüst etmiş. Yapan kişinin isyancı mı asker mi olduğuysa meçhul.
